title: "Bank"; "depositary bank"; "payor bank";
context: §490:4-105 &ldquo;Bank&rdquo;; &ldquo;depositary bank&rdquo;; &ldquo;payor bank&rdquo;; &ldquo;intermediary bank&rdquo;; &ldquo;collecting bank&rdquo;; &ldquo;presenting bank&rdquo;. In this article: (1) &ldquo;Bank&rdquo; means a person engaged in the business of banking, including a savings bank, savings and loan association, credit union, or trust company; (2) &ldquo;Depositary bank&rdquo; means the first bank to take an item even though it is also the payor bank, unless the item is presented for immediate payment over the counter; (3) &ldquo;Payor bank&rdquo; means a bank that is the drawee of a draft; (4) &ldquo;Intermediary bank&rdquo; means a bank to which an item is transferred in course of collection except the depositary or payor bank; (5) &ldquo;Collecting bank&rdquo; means a bank handling an item for collection, except the payor bank; (6) &ldquo;Presenting bank&rdquo; means a bank presenting an item, except a payor bank. [L 1965, c 208, §4-105; HRS §490:4-105; am L 1991, c 118, pt of §4] part of a day during which the receiving bank is open for the receipt, processing, and transmittal of payment orders and cancellations and amendments of payment orders. (5) &ldquo;Funds-transfer system&rdquo; means a wire transfer network, automated clearinghouse, or other communication system of a clearinghouse or other association of banks through which a payment order by a bank may be transmitted to the bank to which the order is addressed. (6) &ldquo;Good faith&rdquo; means honesty in fact and the observance of reasonable commercial standards of fair dealing. (7) &ldquo;Prove&rdquo; with respect to a fact means to meet the burden of establishing the fact (section 490:1-201). (b) Other definitions applying to this article and the sections in which they appear are: &ldquo;Acceptance&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-209. &ldquo;Beneficiary&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-103. &ldquo;Beneficiary&rsquo;s bank&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-103. &ldquo;Executed&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-301. &ldquo;Execution date&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-301. &ldquo;Funds transfer&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-104. &ldquo;Funds-transfer system rule&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-501. &ldquo;Intermediate bank&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-104. &ldquo;Originator&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-104. &ldquo;Originator&rsquo;s bank&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-104. &ldquo;Payment by beneficiary&rsquo;s bank to beneficiary&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-405. &ldquo;Payment by originator to beneficiary&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-406. &ldquo;Payment by sender to receiving bank&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-403. &ldquo;Payment date&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-401. &ldquo;Payment order&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-103. &ldquo;Receiving bank&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-103. &ldquo;Security procedure&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-201. &ldquo;Sender&rdquo;. Section 490:4A-103. &copy; The following definitions in article 4 apply to this article: &ldquo;Clearing-house&rdquo;. Section 490:4-104. &ldquo;Item&rdquo;. Section 490:4-104. &ldquo;Suspends payments&rdquo;. Section 490:4-104. (d) In addition, article 1 contains general definitions and principles of construction and interpretation applicable throughout this article. [L 1991, c 41, pt of §1; am L 2004, c 162, §12]
